Package ChildCareTech.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccessorWindowController  
    CheckPointControllerInterface
    This interface should be implemented by controllers that need acess to the WebcamQRCodeReader thread.
    MainWindowControllerInterface
    This interface should be implemented by controllers that need to access their own mainWindowService attribute and manage their own stage.
    TableWindowControllerInterface
    This interface should be implemented by those controllers that contain a refreshable node such as tableViews, listViews etc and need to have accessors windows.
